headline: How FirstEnergy’s (FE) New Gas and Solar Projects Could Shape Its Long-Term Investment Story
summary: Earlier this month, FirstEnergy announced plans to develop a 1,200-megawatt combined-cycle natural gas plant and a 70-megawatt solar project in West Virginia, which could create over 3,260 jobs during construction and generate US$68 million in state and local tax revenue. This investment signals a significant commitment from FirstEnergy to modernize infrastructure in West Virginia, support economic development, and strengthen its regional energy portfolio with a mix of gas and renewable...

headline: FirstEnergy (FE): Assessing Valuation as Major West Virginia Power Investments Draw Investor Spotlight
summary: FirstEnergy, following its announcement to develop a 1,200-megawatt natural gas plant and expand solar power in West Virginia, is making headlines as investors weigh the impact of these sizable infrastructure investments and the expected economic benefits. See our latest analysis for FirstEnergy. Following this flurry of investment news and FirstEnergy’s latest conference appearance, momentum in the stock appears to be firming up. After a solid 15.31% total shareholder return over the past...
